titleStmt.title: A short and svveete exposition vpon the first nine chapters of Zachary. By William Pemble
titleStmt.author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
Capel, Richard, 1586-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Young for Iohn Bartlet, at the signe of the gilt Cup in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: The "plate" is a woodcut printed as A4, intended to be placed between p. 50 and 51.
Running title reads: An exposition upon the prophesie of Zecharie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
